ing: 1 (16 ounce) package bulk hot pork sausage (such as Jimmy DeanÂ®)
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TELÂ®)
n: The Best Frikin' Party Dip Ever!
des: "This dip is hearty and a crowd pleaser. The 'boys' love the spice and the women love how easy it was to make. Serve with tortilla chips."
ins: Stir the sausage and onions together in a large skillet over medium-high heat until browned and crumbly, about 8 minutes. Drain the grease off of the sausage in a mesh strainer, then return to the skillet. Stir in the cream cheese and diced tomatoes until the cheese has melted and the mixture begins to bubble. Stir in chives before serving.
